definition: a propeller that rotates to push against air, support by placing against something solid or rigid
details:
noun
- a propeller that rotates to push against air
= synonyms: airplane propeller
- a support placed beneath or against something to keep it from shaking or falling
- any movable articles or objects used on the set of a play or movie
= example: any movable articles or objects used on the set of a play or movie
= synonyms: property
verb
- support by placing against something solid or rigid
= synonyms: shore, prop up, shore up
